commit.message:
Merge pull request #752 from ranineTAO/master

#1 #88 #89 #90 #91 #92 #93 #94 #95 #65 实验1-9

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,61 @@
+<manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    package="com.example.ranine99.ranine">
+
+    <application
+        android:allowBackup="true"
+        android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher"
+        android:label="WorldTimer"
+        android:supportsRtl="true"
+        android:theme="@style/AppTheme">
+
+        <activity
+            android:name=".Com1314080901131Activity"
+            android:label="世界时钟">
+            <intent-filter>
+                <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN"/>
+                <action android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER"/>
+
+            </intent-filter>
+        </activity>
+
+        <activity android:name=".SecondActivity_beijing">
+            <intent-filter>
+
+                <action android:name="com.example.ranine99.ranine.ACTION_START"/>
+                <category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT"/>
+                <category android:name="com.example.ranine99.ranine.MY_CATEGORY"/>
+
+            </intent-filter>
+
+        </activity>
+        <activity android:name=".ThirdActivity_London">
+            <intent-filter>
+
+                <action android:name="com.example.ranine99.ranine.ACTION_START"/>
+                <category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT"/>
+                <category android:name="com.example.ranine99.ranine.MY_CATEGORY"/>
+
+            </intent-filter>
+        </activity>
+        <activity android:name=".ListViewActivity">
+            <intent-filter>
+
+                <action android:name="com.example.ranine99.ranine.ACTION_START"/>
+                <category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT"/>
+                <category android:name="com.example.ranine99.ranine.MY_CATEGORY"/>
+
+            </intent-filter>
+        </activity>
+
+        <activity android:name=".ListViewActivity_Choice">
+            <intent-filter>
+
+                <action android:name="com.example.ranine99.ranine.ACTION_START"/>
+                <category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT"/>
+                <category android:name="com.example.ranine99.ranine.MY_CATEGORY"/>
+
+            </intent-filter>
+        </activity>
+    </application>
+
+</manifest>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<shape xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:shape="rectangle">
+
+    <corners
+    android:topLeftRadius="5dp"
+    android:bottomLeftRadius="5dp"
+    android:topRightRadius="0.1dp"
+    android:bottomRightRadius="0.1dp" />
+
+    <stroke

+</shape>

@@ -0,0 +1,52 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/city_name"
+        android:layout_width="0dp"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_gravity="center"
+        android:layout_weight="1"
+        android:padding="5dp"
+        android:textSize="18sp"
+        android:textColor="#ffffff" />
+    <!--android:text="城市中文名 英文名"-->
+
+
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/id_city_time"
+        android:layout_width="0dp"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_gravity="center"
+        android:layout_weight="1"
+        android:padding="5dp"
+        android:text="城市时间"
+        android:textSize="23sp"
+        android:textColor="#fffefe"
+        android:textIsSelectable="false" />
+    <!--<ImageView-->
+    <!--android:id="@+id/city_image"-->
+    <!--android:layout_width="5dp"-->
+    <!--android:layout_height="5dp"-->
+    <!--android:layout_centerInParent="true"-->
+    <!--android:layout_gravity="center"-->
+    <!--android:layout_marginLeft="10dp"/>-->
+
+    <!--<TextView-->
+    <!--android:id="@+id/city_name"-->
+    <!--android:layout_width="wrap_content"-->
+    <!--android:layout_height="wrap_content"-->
+    <!--android:layout_gravity="center"-->
+    <!--android:paddingBottom="5dp"-->
+    <!--android:paddingTop="5dp"-->
+    <!--android:layout_marginLeft="30dp"/>-->
+    <!--
+         <include layout ="@layout/activity_led"
+              android:id="@+id/city_clock"
+              />-->
+
+</LinearLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,16 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:gravity="center_horizontal"  >
+
+
+    <com.example.ranine99.ranine.DigitalClockView
+        xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+        xmlns:clock="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:textSize="14pt"
+        />
+</LinearLayout>
+

@@ -0,0 +1,48 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:orientation="vertical"
+    android:weightSum="1"
+    android:background="@drawable/background"
+    >
+
+   <!-- <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/text_view"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:gravity="center"
+        android:textSize="30sp"
+        android:textColor="#ffffff"
+        android:text="请选择你的当前城市"
+        android:layout_weight="0.13"
+        android:textStyle="bold" />-->
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_2"
+        android:layout_width="149dp"
+        android:layout_height="90dp"
+        android:layout_centerInParent="true"
+        android:text="伦敦 London"
+        android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal"
+        android:background="#00000000"
+        android:layout_weight="0.02"
+        android:textSize="20dp"
+        android:layout_marginTop="80dp"/>
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_1"
+        android:layout_width="149dp"
+        android:layout_height="90dp"
+        android:layout_above="@+id/button_2"
+        android:layout_alignTop="@+id/button_2"
+        android:text="北京 Beijing"
+        android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal"
+        android:visibility="visible"
+        android:textColor="#000000"
+        android:background="#00000000"
+        android:textSize="20dp"
+        android:layout_marginTop="60dp"/>
+
+</LinearLayout>
+

+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:orientation="vertical"
+    android:background="@drawable/background">
+
+    <include layout="@layout/title_2"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="83dp" />
+
+    <ListView
+        android:id="@+id/list_view_city"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent"
+
+        android:drawSelectorOnTop="false">
+
+    </ListView>
+
+</LinearLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,31 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:orientation="vertical"
+    android:background="@drawable/background"
+    android:weightSum="1"
+    >
+
+    <include layout="@layout/title_1"
+         />
+
+    <com.example.ranine99.ranine.AnalogClockView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+        xmlns:clock="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+        android:id="@+id/analog_appwidget2"
+        style="@style/AppWidget"
+        android:layout_width="328dp"
+        android:layout_height="287dp"
+        android:layout_weight="0.45"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="28dp"/>
+    
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="50dp"
+        android:text="北 京"
+        android:textColor="#ffffff"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="170dp"
+        android:textSize="25dp"/>
+
+
+</LinearLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,30 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:orientation="vertical"
+    android:background="@drawable/background"
+    android:weightSum="1"
+    >
+
+    <include layout="@layout/title_1"
+        />
+
+    <com.example.ranine99.ranine.AnalogClockView_london xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+        xmlns:clock="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+        android:id="@+id/analog_appwidget1"
+        style="@style/AppWidget"
+        android:layout_width="328dp"
+        android:layout_height="287dp"
+        android:layout_weight="0.45"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="28dp"/>
+
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="50dp"
+        android:text="伦 敦"
+        android:textColor="#ffffff"
+        android:layout_marginLeft="170dp"
+        android:textSize="25dp"/>
+
+</LinearLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,33 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+    android:layout_marginTop="10dp"
+    >
+
+<TextView
+    android:id="@+id/title_1"
+    android:layout_width="0dp"
+    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+    android:layout_weight="1"
+    android:layout_gravity="center"
+    android:gravity="center"
+    android:text="World Timer 当地时间"
+    android:textColor="#ffffff"
+    android:textSize="28sp"
+
+    android:background="#00000000" />
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_title"
+        android:background="@drawable/style"
+        android:layout_width="66dp"
+        android:layout_height="32dp"
+        android:layout_gravity="center"
+        android:layout_margin="5dp"
+        android:text="切换"
+
+        android:textColor="#fff"
+        android:onClick="change"/>
+
+    //添加标题栏，暂无背景background
+</LinearLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,30 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:layout_marginTop="10dp">
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/title_1"
+        android:layout_width="0dp"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_weight="1"
+        android:layout_gravity="center"
+        android:gravity="center"
+        android:text="World Timer 世界时间"
+        android:textColor="#fff"
+        android:textSize="28sp"
+
+        android:background="#00000000" />
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_title"
+        android:background="@drawable/style"
+
+        android:layout_width="66dp"
+        android:layout_height="32dp"
+        android:layout_gravity="center"
+        android:layout_margin="5dp"
+        android:text="添加"
+        android:textColor="#fff"
+        android:onClick="change_2"/>
+</LinearLayout>

@@ -0,0 +1,17 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<resources>
+    <declare-styleable name="AnalogClockView">
+        <attr name="dial" format="reference" />
+        <attr name="hand_hour" format="reference" />
+        <attr name="hand_minute" format="reference" />
+        <attr name="hand_second" format="reference" />
+    </declare-styleable>
+
+    <declare-styleable name="DigitalClockView">
+        <attr name="time_res" format="reference" />
+    </declare-styleable>
+    <declare-styleable name="DigitalClockView2">
+        <attr name="time_res2" format="reference" />
+    </declare-styleable>
+
+</resources>
\ No newline at end of file
